name: Path to the Creator
description: This game is a fun Text-Based Strategy RPG that features a story and an endless mode, crafting, forging, classes and more! Play more casually in story mode or play endless mode to solve puzzles and make the leaderboard! To get on the leaderboard, send me a video of you going to your stats page or just a screenshot of the page on the discord. If you die, the page that displays stats also counts!
